title: Please see this and fill the form 🙏
content:
Hey everyone, If you're a student (or were recently one), I’d love it if you could take just 2-3 minutes to fill out this survey. Your input will directly contribute to meaningful insights, and it could help students like us make better choices in the future! 🙌

[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdEDyY8Ur2ntteSKWsbOH2U\_d4JvIafS4FXcKfe0f7K9okc9g/viewform?usp=sf\_link](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdEDyY8Ur2ntteSKWsbOH2U_d4JvIafS4FXcKfe0f7K9okc9g/viewform?usp=sf_link)

It’s completely anonymous, and the data will only be used for research and educational purposes. Feel free to share this with your friends or classmates as well — the more responses, the better!

Thanks a ton in advance! Your participation really means a lot!"

comments.body:
Saw this and filled the form 💯💯  
Great survey!
